name: Temple of Heck
description:
Temple of Heck is a Challenging 2D Treasure Hunting Game made for the Global Game Jam 2021 by Team Ghostbusters.

Race against time to collect treasures in puzzle rooms laid out with dangerous traps!

Team Ghostbusters is:
Arif - Game Design/Programming (https://arifimraniskandar.wixsite.com/website)
Wang Hai Feng - Game Design/Programming/VFX (thum7@hotmail.com)
Guluere Chan Kwok Chun - Game Design/Environment Art (chunc59@yahoo.com)
Han - Character Art
